name: 2d Platformer Beta Version (updated)
description:
Added mobile support !!

Please use the full screen mode for better experience.

Please use portrait mode for better experience.

If you are stuck then click on the restart button on the up right corner to restart the game.

If you would win the game will restart !

If you would lose the game will restart too !!!

Sorry for that :(

 

The game is too harder now    :)

Have fun !

Added coin counting :)

Enemies will be added soon !

Full version coming soon !...

THANK YOU !
